text:
April 16, 1956
Hr. FLoyde E. Brooker
Executive Secretary
Dept, of Audio-Visual Instruction
National Education Association
1201 Sixteenth Street, N.W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Hr. Brooker:
Dr. Skomia is out of the office until the end of the month and will,
therefore, be unable to send you the names of possible authors for
ETV articles in time for your May issue, as requested in your letter
of April 10.
However, your letter will be called to Dr. Skomiaâ€™s attention upon
Ms return and I*m sure that if he has any suggestions he will pass
them on to you for your later use.
Sincerely,
HEHljy
Harold E. Hill
Associate Director
